attributes.action: insist that companies providing plastic packaging on food and drink to label them accordingly as to whether the plastic is recyclable or not
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this age where people need to recycle products  it would be of great benefit to consumers to know which plastic products are recyclable and which should be disposed of. This would also help to cut down on plastic products which are sent for recycling which are not recyclable.
